animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I have soft fur and whiskers.
🐈‍⬛ I purr when you pet me.

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I like to eat seeds and plants.
💛 I am often yellow when I am little.
💧 I have webbed feet to help me swim.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to play fetch.
🏡 I protect your house.
🐾 I am a good friend.

animal.question: I moo and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I live on a farm.
🌱 I eat grass in the field.
🥛 I am often black and white or brown.

animal.question: I hop and like to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have long ears.
🐰 I can be white, brown, or black.
🌱 I live in a burrow.

animal.question: I have big teeth and build dams in the river. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I like to chew on wood.
🦷 I have a flat tail.
💧 I live near the water.

animal.question: I carry my house on my back and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
I am a reptile or a mollusk.
🛡️ My house protects me.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and gallop fast. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa.
🐎 I look like a horse.
⚫ My stripes help me hide.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am very tall.
🌿 I like to eat acacia leaves.
🌍 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a primate.
🍌 I live in the jungle.
🗣️ I like to make funny noises.

transport.question: I go 'choo choo' and ride on a track. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I have many carriages behind me.
🚂 People ride me to different cities.
💨 I make a lot of steam or electricity.

transport.question: I have wheels and go 'vroom vroom' on the road. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can be lots of different colors.
👪 Families ride in me to go places.
🚦 I stop at red lights.

transport.question: I float on water and help people cross the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a duck!
⚓️ I need an anchor to stay in one spot.
🚢 I carry people and things across the water.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can ride me to the park.
🔔 I often have a bell to ring.
🚲 I need a helmet to keep you safe.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am much bigger than a bird!
✈️ I go to other countries.
💺 People sit inside me to travel.

transport.question: I'm big and yellow and take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I stop to pick up kids.
🚌 I have lots of seats.
👧👦 Many children ride me together.

transport.question: I have a siren and take people to the hospital very quickly. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 My siren is loud!
🚑 I have a red cross on the side.
👩‍⚕️ Doctors and nurses sometimes ride in me.

transport.question: I’m fast and red, and help put out fires. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I have a long hose.
🔥 I help keep people safe from fire.
🧑‍🚒 Firefighters ride me to put out fires.

transport.question: I zoom through space and carry astronauts to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very tall and pointy.
👩‍🚀 I go higher than a plane!
✨ I visit other planets.

transport.question: I travel under the sea, and help explorers to see the fish. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am waterproof.
🐠 You can see ocean animals from my windows.
⚓ I sink deep into the ocean.
